message.content:
cs.CG, cs.DS, cs.DM, cs.CC, cs.GT. 

The problem involves partitioning a set of points in the plane and computing the convex hull of each subset, which suggests computational geometry (cs.CG) as a likely category. The use of algorithms to solve the problem also suggests categories such as data structures (cs.DS) and discrete mathematics (cs.DM). The paper also mentions related problems and approximation algorithms, which could fall under categories such as computational complexity (cs.CC) and game theory (cs.GT).
